resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with added hot water (100-150 ml).
Espresso with steamed milk and a little foam.
Starbucks Corporation is an American multinational chain of coffeehouses and roastery reserves headquartered in Seattle, Washington. It is the worlds largest coffeehouse chain.

It is undeniable that Janji Jiwa outlets have spread to many places. Janji Jiwa is a local coffee brand popular among students, workers, and families. With the slogan coffee from the heart, Janji Jiwa is committed to serving coffee with a classic taste for coffee lovers.
At Kopi Kenangan, their dream is to serve high quality coffee made with the freshest local ingredients to customers across Indonesia and the rest of the world.
